name: employee-management-system
description: Employee Management System with CRUD operations

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd client && npm test"
